document_title: What is a vasomotor headache? Symptoms, causes and treatments
subsection_content:
There are many causes that can trigger a vasomotor headache, the most common include:
Beer, wine and alcoholic beverages; Excessive stress and anxiety; Weather changes lead to changes in air pressure; Change in circadian rhythm (wake up or sleep too much), exercise with unusual intensity; Hormonal changes in women during menstruation and premenopause; Foods such as fast food, chocolate, foods containing many additives, etc.; Use medicine
subsection_title: dau dau van mach.json. Causes of vasomotor headaches
